title: Rangu Rakkara Song Lyrics Sivalinga
stanzas:
Rangu Rakkara Song Lyrics #Sivalinga
#RanguRakkara #Anirudh #ThamanS

rangu rakkara
rakkara rakkara
rakkara rakkara

[ Hey
Daaladikkum kannakaari
naan irukken dontu worry
unakethukku acham acham?

asaigala allow pannu
achangala delete pannu
poi varalaam
uchcham uchcham

yen mieow meow
poonaikkellaam
mersal aagura.

baendha baendha
mulichikinnu
beethi adaiyura

total-aaga maari neeyum
vaadi trendy-ya

paar notta kooda
maathirichu namma INDIA
namma India
namma India

hey
rangu rakkara
rakkara rakkara (3)
rakkara rakkara raa ] (2)

Palanadhu venaa
adha oththi vaiyadi
vandhu pallaarunu
kannathula mutham
vaiyadi

rangu rakkara
rakkara rakkara (3)
rakkara rakkara raa

Orey oru muthathoda
oayamaaten daa
unna muthathaala
metha senji thoonga
vaippen daa

rangu rakkara
rakkara rakkara (3)
rakkara rakkara raa

Nee rendaairayam
rubaa note-u
naan serthu vaikkura
saettu
vaa munnum pinnum kaatu
idhu orginalaa doubtu

un kindal ellaam cuteu
naan aadiputen flattu
nee fixu pannu dateu
naan vaikkurenda treatu

Daaladikkum kannakaari
naan irukken dontu worry
unakethukku acham acham?

oru sentiment-a
jell-aagi naan irupenda
ne centimeter prinjaalum
naan thavippen da

rangu rakkara
rakkara rakkara (3)
rakkara rakkara raa

un kendakaala paathidave
kenjiduven di
un konda poova kondaa
naan kumbiduven di

rangu rakkara
rakkara rakkara (3)
rakkara rakkara raa

nee minnum pinnum massu
nan mullillaadha roseu
vaa polam kadhal race-u
idhu ooru pooraa newsu

nee watermelan juice-u
naan vaatamaana glassu
en valibame ice-u
ini vazhkai very nice-u

Daaladikkum kannakaari
naan irukken dontu worry
unakethukku acham acham?

asaigala allow pannu
achangala delete pannu
poi varalaam
uchcham uchcham

yen mieow meow
poonaikkellaam
mersal aagura.

baendha baendha
mulichikinnu
beethi adaiyura

total-aaga maari neeyum
vaadi trendy-ya

paar notta kooda
maathirichu namma INDIA
namma India
namma India

rakkara rakkara raa
